title: Roasted Carrots with Garlic and Olives
introduction: Carrots, garlic, and olives are a harmonious blend, with the saltiness of the olives enhancing the natural sweetness of the carrots. This delightful dish originates from Liguria, near the border with France.
ingredients: 8 medium carrots, peeled and cut diagonally into 1/2-inch-thick slices
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup pitted imported mild black olives, such as Gaeta
instructions: 1. Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 425Â°F. In a large baking pan, toss the carrots with the oil, garlic, and salt and pepper to taste.
2. Roast for 15 minutes. Stir in the olives and cook until the carrots are tender, about 5 minutes more. Serve hot.
